name: blower and heat exchange unit production, Storkair G 90 | blower and heat exchange unit, Storkair G 90 | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7851/documentation

Production of a typical component used for a decentral ventilation system in a multi family house. The house considered in the investigation includes 6 flats with 130 m2 floor area each and a ventilation rate of 120 m3/h.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Materials used for the production. Estimation of electricity use for the different production steps. Energy use for heating of the production building. Transport of raw materials to the plant. Estimation for the Infrastructure of the Production site included.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2819:Manufacture of other general-purpose machinery

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data for production in the Netherlands used.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Ventilation unit for decentral ventilation systems with 120 m3/h average air flow. Housing made of galvanised steel insulated with expanded polystyrene. Heat recovery element made of polystyrene. Total weight of component 32.7 kg
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Questionnaire and technical information of producer. Data of one common product used.
